skill.name: Allured by Darkness
skill.description: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1800. instead of conducting your normal draw, 'Allure of Darkness' is added to your hand from outside of your Deck.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yubel. Her decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm her as efficiently as possible.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Yubel

children.content: keys to duel at the gate.
Yubel appears at the gate at Stage 6 (GX)
The Yubel Cards comprise one of the most consistent Farm Decks in Duel Links. Pick them up now if you haven't already!
Achieve 1 Comeback Victory(ies) in Duels against Yubel using
Successfully perfom 2 Fusion Summon(s) in one Duel against Yubel at level 30 while playing as
3 time(s) in 1 Duel against Yubel at level 30 using

card.name: Assault Blackwing - Onimaru the Divine Thunder

skill.name: Destiny Draw
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 2000. In the Draw Phase, instead of conducting your normal draw, draw a card of your choice. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
He appears at the gate at Stage 15 (unless chosen as your starting character)
Yami Yugi Level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching Stage 30
Pick as a starter character (or reach Stage 15 in DM Duel World if you choose
Use a Spell Card 5 time(s) in one Duel.
and win 1 Duel(s) against Yami Yugi at level 30 in Duel World.

skill.name: Ultimate Dragons
skill.description:
At the beginning of the Duel, add 'Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon', 'Neo Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon', and 'Blue-Eyes Twin Burst Dragon' to your Extra Deck.
Can be used on turn 3 and onward by revealing 2 'Blue-Eyes White Dragon' in your hand to your opponent. Add 'Polymerization' to your hand from outside of your Deck.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

authors.description:
Heya! Pl0x here, known as Sally in DLM. I'm super cute, blind without my glasses, and have HUGE  tiddies that get buffed every banlist.

Feel free to message me if you need anything!

skill.name: Sealed Tombs
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

skill.name: Equipment Exchange
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are at 3000 or below. Return up to 2 cards, including at least 1 Equip Spell Card, from your hand to the bottom of your Deck and draw the same number of cards as you returned. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

Inflict 7000 or more points of effect damage in Duels against Aigami.

Use Continuous Trap Cards 3 time(s) in Duels against Aigami at level 30 using

skill.name: Endless Trap Hell
skill.description: Can be used when you have 3 Trap Cards in your Graveyard. Add 1 random Trap Card to your hand from your Graveyard and return 1 card to your Deck from your hand. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

skill.description: Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1000. All monsters on the field and monsters in both players' Graveyards become Zombie-Type monsters until the end of your opponent's turn.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Bonz efficiently! His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Bonz

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Bonz appears at the gate at stage 13 (DM)
Bonz level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching stage 30
Bonz himself is a useful character to have, with skills like
Achieve 1 Comeback Victory(ies) in Duels against Bonz at level 30 using
Win 1 Duels within 6 turn(s) against Bonz at level 30 while playing as
Achieve 1 No Damage Win(s) in Duels against Bonz at level 30 using
Achieve 3 win(s) using only Zombie-Type Cards.

skill.name: Duel Fuel
skill.description: Can be used the turn you begin with lower Life Points than your opponent. Gain 1000 Life Points. This Skill can only be used once per turn and twice per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yuma and Astral. Their decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm them as efficiently as possible.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Yuma and Astral

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
You will see Yuma and Astral's unlock missions upon reaching Stage 9 or above in Duel World (DM)
Unlocking Yuma and Astral will also unlock Duel World (ZEXAL)
Use Level 4 Monster Cards 2 time(s) in one Duel.

skill.name: Sealed Tombs
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Ishizu Ishtar efficiently! Her decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Ishizu Ishtar

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Ishizu Ishtar level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching stage 30
Summon LIGHT Monster(s) 200 time(s) in total.
Win 1 Duel (s) against Ishizu Ishtar at Level 30 in Duel World.
Win a Duel against Ishizu Ishatar with at least 6,000 LP remaining.
